00048 {
00049     MagnitudeLorentzian m(1,0,1); // m(x) = 1/sqrt(x^2+1)
00050     unit_assert_equal(m(0), 1, epsilon_);
00051     unit_assert_equal(m(1), 1/sqrt(2.), epsilon_);
00052     unit_assert_equal(m(2), 1/sqrt(5.), epsilon_);
00053     unit_assert_equal(m(3), 1/sqrt(10.), epsilon_);
00054     unit_assert_equal(m(4), 1/sqrt(17.), epsilon_);
00055 
00056     // center == 0, alpha == 2*pi, tau == 1/(2*pi)
00057     unit_assert_equal(m.center(), 0, epsilon_);
00058     unit_assert_equal(m.alpha(), 2*M_PI, epsilon_);
00059     unit_assert_equal(m.tau(), 1/(2*M_PI), epsilon_);
00060 
00061     if (os_) *os_ << "testBasic(): success!\n";
